sanskrit_verse: अरक्षितारं राजानं बलिषड्भागहारिणम् । अरक्षितारमत्तारं तमाहुः सर्वलोकस्य समग्रमलहारकम् ॥ ८.३०८॥
transliteration: arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ baliṣaḍbhāgahāriṇam |arakṣitāramattāraṃ tamāhuḥ sarvalokasya samagramalahārakam || 8.308||
sph_interpretive_translation: The King who does not protect is a thief of one-sixth of all offerings; the King who remains indifferent while his subjects are unprotected is declared by all worlds to be the source of total loss.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority implies existential obligation to sustain protection

Capacity-based responsibility extends proportionally with sovereign power
Restoration logic requires re-alignment of protective capacity
Consciousness alignment demands recognition of sovereignty as service
